item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome First pages are always interesting because they are quickly out-dated. I am very hopeful about the rapid growth of this site once the foundation is properly complete, and I wish to address the future of Clallam|LGBT: Template modifications are ongoing for the foreseeable future. The glossary will be designed to expand outwards with no expectation of finite boundaries Events will be updated as we get closer to Pride Season™. I'm always looking for additional content contributors, whether graphics, coders, or writers!
